post.desc:
The only thing I could find about "Seven Ghosts" is the Shichir≈ç Falls. The idea is that there were seven court ladies from the defeated Taira clan fleeing the Minamoto clan into the mountains, and they decided to jump off a waterfall instead of getting captured. The local villagers buried their bodies and built a shrine over the area.

And I have no clue about the last line, but I have a pretty good feeling it's word-play.
